attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2010-1074

Date: 2010-08-10

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Daniel J. Caron, Librarian and Archivist of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($186,300 - $219,200), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gérard Latulippe, President, International Centre for Human Rights and Democratic Development, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($162,100 - $190,800), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Alain Beaudet, President, Canadian Institutes of Health Research, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 10 ($246,400 - $289,900), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of André Beaudet, Secretary, National Battlefields Commission, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 3 ($92,800 - $109,200), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Suzanne Clément, Coordinator, Office of the Coordinator (Status of Women Canada), as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($162,100 - $190,800), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Suzanne Fortier, President, Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 9 ($214,200 - $252,100), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Chad Gaffield, President, Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 9 ($214,200 - $252,100), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of André McArdle, Secretary, Canadian Intergovernmental Conference Secretariat, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 4 ($106,600 - $125,500), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of David McLaughlin, President, National Round Table on the Environment and the Economy, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($162,100 - $190,800), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Tom Perlmutter, Chairperson and Government Film Commissioner, National Film Board, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($186,300 - $219,200), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Michel Perron, Chief Executive Officer, Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 5 ($122,600 - $144,300), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Joel Jeffrey Sokolsky, Principal, Royal Military College of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($162,100 - $190,800), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Peter Sylvester, former President, Canadian Environmental Assessment Agency, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($162,100 - $190,800), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Jeanne M. Flemming, Director, Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 8 ($186,300 - $219,200), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of S. Len Hong, President, Canadian Centre for Occupational Health and Safety, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($141,100 - $166,000), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Alan Latourelle, Chief Executive Officer, Parks Canada Agency, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($182,400 - $214,700), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Steve MacLean, President, Canadian Space Agency, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($182,400 - $214,700), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Walter John Natynczyk, Chief of the Defence Staff, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($209,800 - $246,900), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Clare Beckton, former Coordinator, Office of the Coordinator (Status of Women Canada), as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($159,700 - $187,900), effective July 10, 2009.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Pierre Coulombe, former President, National Research Council of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 10 ($242,700 - $285,600), effective February 13, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Anne McCaskill, former Secretary, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) Secretariat - Canadian Section, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 4 ($105,000 - $123,600), effective October 16, 2009.
